QuestData.Title: Extended Shore Leave
QuestData.Description: The Zandalari have already begun repairing that warship, but we can keep it crippled with minimal effort.$B$BSimply relieve the new captain of his post, and steal the ship's damage report from that workshop just outside the vault.$B$BNo captain. No repairs. No warship.
QuestData.LogDescription: Steal the Workshop Orders and slay the new captain of the Zandalari warship.
